subcategory.name: Incentives
subcategory.description: Ecommerce incentive examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS incentive components to highlight special offers, discounts, loyalty rewards, and promotional deals that encourage customers to make purchases in your store. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: 3-column with illustrations and split header
components.imageCreditsHtml: Images provided by Ugmonk
components.iframeHtml:
We built our business on great customer service

At the beginning at least, but then we realized we could make a lot more money if we kinda stopped caring about that. Our new strategy is to write a bunch of things that look really good in the headlines, then clarify in the small print but hope people don't actually read it.

Free shipping

It's not actually free we just price it into the products. Someone's paying for it, and it's not us.

10-year warranty

If it breaks in the first 10 years we'll replace it. After that you're on your own though.

Exchanges

If you don't like it, trade it to one of your friends for something of theirs. Don't send it here though.

snippet.name: react
snippet.code:
const incentives = [ { name: 'Free shipping', imageSrc: '/plus-assets/img/ecommerce/icons/icon-shipping-simple.svg', description: "It's not actually free we just price it into the products. Someone's paying for it, and it's not us.", }, { name: '10-year warranty', imageSrc: '/plus-assets/img/ecommerce/icons/icon-warranty-simple.svg', description: "If it breaks in the first 10 years we'll replace it. After that you're on your own though.", }, { name: 'Exchanges', imageSrc: '/plus-assets/img/ecommerce/icons/icon-exchange-simple.svg', description: "If you don't like it, trade it to one of your friends for something of theirs. Don't send it here though.", }, ] export default function Example() { return (

We built our business on great customer service

At the beginning at least, but then we realized we could make a lot more money if we kinda stopped caring about that. Our new strategy is to write a bunch of things that look really good in the headlines, then clarify in the small print but hope people don't actually read it.

{incentives.map((incentive) => (

{incentive.name}

{incentive.description}

))}
) }

components.name: 4-column with illustrations
components.iframeHtml:
Free Shipping

It's not actually free we just price it into the products. Someone's paying for it, and it's not us.

24/7 Customer Support

Our AI chat widget is powered by a naive series of if/else statements. Guaranteed to irritate.

Fast Shopping Cart

Look how fast that cart is going. What does this mean for the actual experience? I don't know.

Gift Cards

Buy them for your friends, especially if they don't like our store. Free money for us, it's great.

snippet.name: react

components.name: 2x2 grid with illustrations
components.iframeHtml:
Our perks

Free delivery

Order now and you'll get delivery absolutely free. Well, it's not actually free, we just price it into the products. Someone's paying for it, and it's not us.

10-year warranty

We have a 10 year warranty with every product that you purchase, whether thats a new pen or organizer, you can be sure we'll stand behind it.

Exchanges

We understand that when your product arrives you might not particularly like it, or you ordered the wrong thing. Conditions apply here.

For the planet

Like you, we love the planet, and so we've pledged 1% of all sales to the preservation and restoration of the natural environment.

snippet.name: react

components.name: 3-column with icons and supporting text
components.iframeHtml:
Our perks

10-year all-inclusive warranty

We’ll replace it with a new one

Free shipping on returns

Send it back for free

Free, contactless delivery

The shipping is on us

snippet.name: react
snippet.code:
import { ArrowPathIcon, CalendarIcon, TruckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' const perks = [ { name: '10-year all-inclusive warranty', description: 'We’ll replace it with a new one', icon: CalendarIcon }, { name: 'Free shipping on returns', description: 'Send it back for free', icon: ArrowPathIcon }, { name: 'Free, contactless delivery', description: 'The shipping is on us', icon: TruckIcon }, ] export default function Example() { return (

Our perks

{perks.map((perk, perkIdx) => (

{perk.name}

{perk.description}

))}
) }
